events.text: Runner, youâ€™ll find yourself more at ease when traversing our home if you decide to use your legs for something a bit more exerting than just running.
Jumping will be a tool of great use for a tool like you, but beware! For the clouds can get a little bit... unstable... after they touch your defiled self

[i]Press the [wave amp=50 freq=2]spacebar[/wave] to jump, double tap it to double jump.
[wave amp=50 freq=2]Hold[/wave] the space bar to jump even higher[/i]
